attributes.action: Reverse the law lords' decision, which bars people with the asbestos related condition pleural plaques from making a claim for compensation. r
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Sport newspaper has launched a campaign, Justice for the Victims of Dust, along with Unions and specialist law firms, to urge the government to reverse the decision by the Law Lords to bar people who have contracted pleueral plaques from seeking compensation. This overrules a law that had been in place for more than 20 years. We also have the support of a number of MPs from the different parties.
